name: The Adventures of Lemon-Head
description:
This game is a prototype I made for an action plat-former. It is based on the Lemon-Head comic series and introduces new characters and familiar villains. Lemon-Head has to overcome obstacles and enemies to defeat his nemesis, Big Brain. Will he succeed?

Controls:
- Move: A, W, S, D
- Attack: K
- Interact: L
- Jump: Spacebar
- Restart: R
